attributes.action: Give England a Bank Holiday for St. Georges Day.
attributes.additional_details: To bring England into line with Scotland, and Northern Island who have Bank Holidays for their National Days. It will also allow English people to demonstrate their pride in being English.
attributes.background: Give England a Bank Holiday for St. Georges Day.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601672
